page.title: 20INTERVIEWS ABOUT WORK-WIDNES
page.content: 'I am a{barmaid}and work from 7.30.pm till midnight,four nights a week. I have to wear a black skirt and white blouse. I like my job because I meet lots of different people. Also the hours suit me as I have to look after my 3 yr old child in the day'{.... 'I work in a{cake factory}five days a week from 6.am to 10.am making Chorley cakes. I have to wear a white overall with long sleeves,a hair net,a mob cap and a plastic apron. I like the hours because most of the day I'm free'{... I am a{student}training to be a{hotel {receptionist.}I work from 9.30.am till 4.30.pm five days a week,but the work is not hard and we have plenty of breaks during the day.I don't wear a uniform but I have to dress smartly, particularly when I am in the college restaurant.I finish soon and hope to get a job.{(DONNA PICKERING,ST.BASILS)
